com.metricstream.appstudio.ism.service.form.commonconvertion

Class ISMCommonConvertion

  • java.lang.Object
    • CommonConvertor
      • com.metricstream.appstudio.ism.service.form.commonconvertion.ISMCommonConvertion

  • public class ISMCommonConvertion
extends CommonConvertor
    This program used to convert the display value to stored value provided in upload template
